strings.Value: "My wife would cook venison stew like no one else in the world. And now my life is reduced to eating dry rations."
"Once, hot homemade meals awaited me every time I returned home. Now I choke on dry rations."
"I know you've been through a lot, but don't be so gloomy! You may yet meet that special someone who cares about you!"
"Will you ever stop whimpering? Finish your crackers and get some sleep!"
"It feels strange to hear stories about such comforts. Home-made mealsâ€¦ Things familiar to everyone, but unknown to me."
"I can't stand widowers. Spare a slave his chains, and he will mourn them to the end of his life."
"Fate is unpredictable. She who spent the night at home yesterday, may sleep in a dirty gutter tonight, and in a palace tomorrow."
